about_the_game:
This art collection for "Paper Bride 5: Two Lifetimes" showcases high-definition promotional artwork, unreleased concept art and creative ideas for this new installment in the Paper Bride series. Welcome to the world of Paper Bride.

This collection primarily features concept art and ideas for characters, environments, in-game items, and also contains Steam promotional artwork.

Love in the past, shall reunite in this life.
No matter how long it takes, I will wait for you up ahead.

Let's take a look behind the scenes of "Paper Bride 5: Two Lifetimes"~
detailed_description:
This art collection for "Paper Bride 5: Two Lifetimes" showcases high-definition promotional artwork, unreleased concept art and creative ideas for this new installment in the Paper Bride series. Welcome to the world of Paper Bride.

This collection primarily features concept art and ideas for characters, environments, in-game items, and also contains Steam promotional artwork.

Love in the past, shall reunite in this life.
No matter how long it takes, I will wait for you up ahead.

Let's take a look behind the scenes of "Paper Bride 5: Two Lifetimes"~
name: Paper Bride 5: Two Lifetimes - Original Artwork & Concept Art

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • Storage: 47 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This art collection for "Paper Bride 5: Two Lifetimes" showcases high-definition promotional artwork, unreleased concept art and creative ideas for this new installment in the Paper Bride series. Welcome to the world of Paper Bride.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
